title: Mika Flint: Orion's Crown
description: Mika feels alone and mistreated. He has never felt special or good at anything. At thirteen years old, he finds out that he is a death angel. He learns that death has escaped, and now he is the only one with the power to capture it again. He has no idea how to use his powers, and there is an evil army of death angels that wants him dead. The clue to surviving lies with Orion's Crown. Mika must master his powers, battle creatures he has never seen before, and become the kid he has always wanted to be. All of this happens as he travels to worlds that humans have never seen before with a group of the most unlikely friends. His goal is to find Orion's Crown before it's too late. Will he become the hero everyone wants him to be, or will he die in the quest?
author: Terry Carsten
